description: Detects the attack technique pass the hash which is used to move laterally inside the network
name: Pass the Hash Activity 2
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4624" AND ((winlog.event_data.SubjectUserSid:"S\-1\-0\-0" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"3" AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:"NtLmSsp" AND winlog.event_data.KeyLength:"0") OR (winlog.event_data.LogonType:"9" AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:"seclogo"))) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:"ANONYMOUS\ LOGON")))
author: Dave Kennedy
Jeff Warren (method) / David Vassallo (rule)
